visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year. The chart should also have custom colors for the series and additional configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The data series represents monthly average temperatures for a year, with custom colors applied to the series. Additional configurations include chart margins, background styling, and legend settings to enhance the overall appearance and usability of the chart. The legend is positioned vertically and floated to the left, providing a clear and organized presentation of the data series.
